list_definition.definition: a person who reviews books etc

list_ex_of_english: The project also found that the nurse reviewers made more referrals to other healthcare professionals than previously made by the clinical oncologist.
If two reviewers disagreed, a third echocardiographer was consulted.
The authors would also like to thank the anonymous reviewers for their helpful comments.
We thank t h e anonymous peer reviewers for their comments.
We use standard functional programming techniques and code reviewers find that style more comprehensible.
We thank the peer reviewers for their comments.
Articles will be submitted to two anonymous reviewers.
I also wish to thank four anonymous reviewers whose penetrating questions led to two fairly radical rethinks of the arguments and organization.
